snippet: The Chicago White Sox, backed by pitching from Jose Quintana, beat the Detroit Tigers on Monday night to increase their lead in the American League Central to three games.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago White Sox beat the Detroit Tigers, 6-1; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago White Sox, backed by pitching from Jose Quintana, beat the Detroit Tigers on Monday night to increase their lead in the American League Central to three games.

headline.seo: White Sox Beat Tigers to Widen Lead in A.L. Central
headline.main: White Sox Expand Lead in Central
headline.print_headline: White Sox Expand Lead in Central
